thread.title: Raiders rookie Neiron Ball loving life after nearly losing his
thread.title_full: Raiders rookie Neiron Ball loving life after nearly losing his - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Vic Tafur
title: Raiders rookie Neiron Ball loving life after nearly losing his
text:
Photo: Ezra Shaw, Getty Images Raiders linebacker Neiron Ball (58) puts the pressure on Denver RB C.J. Anderson (22) in the fourth quarter in a game the rookie played 36 snaps and shut down tight end Owen Daniels. Raiders linebacker Neiron Ball (58) puts the pressure on Denver RB...
Neiron Ball came out of nowhere, which is to say he has overcome many obstacles that would have stopped most people. On this particular day, in a game three weeks ago against the Browns in Cleveland, the seldom-used Raiders rookie linebacker burst through the line to sack Josh McCown. Raiders linebacker Neiron Ball (58) puts the pressure on Denver RB C.J. Anderson (22) in the fourth quarter in a game the rookie played 36 snaps and shut down tight end Owen Daniels. Neiron Ball came out of nowhere, which is to say he has overcome many obstacles that would have stopped most people. On this particular day, in a game three weeks ago against the Browns in Cleveland, the seldom-used Raiders rookie linebacker burst through the line to sack Josh McCown.
